title: Template: Marketing Manager — Cdmx (es-MX)
html:
Template — Marketing Manager in Cdmx (es-MX)

ATS‑ready template localized for es-MX. Use action verbs and quantify impact.

  • Optimized core processes; improved efficiency by 25%.
  • Led cross-functional teams to deliver key initiatives.
  • Collaborated with stakeholders to achieve strategic goals.
